entry.title: 3M F-7300-BLK-10 - 3M High Productivity Pad, 7300, 254 mm (10 in) F-7300-BLK-10 7000120617
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 30.23

[shortdesc]

3M High Productivity Pad, 7300, 254 mm (10 in)

  • 3M™ High Productivity Pad, 7300 is a floor maintenance stripping pad quickly and thoroughly removes old floor finish, dirt and build-up
  • It is made of continuous filament nylon in an open-web construction, which allows the stripping solution to flow trough the pad to rinse out dirt and reduce loading for increased pad-to-floor contact and efficient stripping
  • Abrasive particles are dispersed throughout and bonded to the non-woven construction with a durable resin system that permeates the entire pad
  • These pads are constructed to be durable and offer consistent performance.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Our most aggressive stripping pad
  • Made of continuous filament nylon in an open textured non-woven construction
  • For fast removal of finish and proven consistent stripping
    		•

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Hand Pads
Price: 1.33

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Brite General Purpose Hand Pad, 07447

  • Scotch-Brite™ General Purpose Hand Pad combines flexibility with effective cutting action and precise hand control to accomplish tough cleaning jobs or produce fine finishing results, use after use
  • This pad features a very fine grade of aluminum oxide abrasive to cut fast and fine, leaving a smooth, finished surface
  • Suitable for use on a wide variety of materials and for many different tasks.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch-Brite
    Origin Country Canada
    Product Type Hand Pads

    Product Information

  • Suitable for use on wood, metal, plastics, ceramics, porcelain, glass, rubber, or composites
  • Reusable pad resists tearing, splintering, shredding, loading and will never rust, providing a long, useful life
  • Can be folded, stacked, or rolled for effective cleaning or conditioning on flat, irregular, or contoured surfaces
